column5: My fishing crew and I have been going to the same small lake in S. Ontario for 10 years. We always have a great time, but the lake has only pike and bass. We'd like to find a lake within a couple hours of the 1000 Is. bridge that has decent walleye fishing with cottages for rent. We drag four boats (16-18 footers) so we need docking as well. I'd welcome any suggestions. Thanks & Good Fishing, Sluggo
